wikipedia_page.main: Carl Alan Wilson (8 May 1940 – 24 January 2019) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Gateshead, Doncaster Rovers, Millwall and Newcastle United as a centre forward. He also played in the Netherlands and Germany for Sparta Rotterdam and Schwarz-Weiß Essen respectively.

link_mentions.page: List of foreign football players in the Netherlands

response: Carl Wilson (1946–1998) was an American singer, guitarist and composer, best known as a founding member of The Beach Boys.
Carl Wilson may also refer to:
*Carl Wilson (album), 1981 self-titled album by Carl Wilson
*Carl Wilson (politician), member of the Oregon House of Representatives
